content.question:
Which of the following series converge?

I. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mn>8</mn> <mi>n</mi> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGabaakoabaaaaaaa aapeWaaabCa8aabaWdbmaalaaapaqaa8qacaaI4aWdamaaCaaaleqa baWdbiaad6gaaaaak8aabaWdbiaad6gacaGGHaaaaaWcpaqaa8qaca WGUbGaeyypa0JaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaeyOhIukaniabggHiLdaaaa@440B@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

II. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>n</mi> <mrow> <mn>100</mn></mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGabaakoabaaaaaaa aapeWaaabCa8aabaWdbmaalaaapaqaa8qacaWGUbGaaiyiaaWdaeaa peGaamOBa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIXaGaaGimaiaaicdaaaaaaa WdaeaapeGaamOBaiabg2da9iaaigdaa8aabaWdbiabg6HiLcqdcqGH ris5aaaa@4563@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

III. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mrow> <mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGabaakoabaaaaaaa aapeWaaabCa8aabaWdbmaalaaapaqaa8qacaWGUbGaey4kaSIaaGym aaWdaeaapeWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaad6gaaiaawIcacaGLPaaadaqada WdaeaapeGaamOBaiabgUcaRiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaadaqadaWd aeaapeGaamOBaiabgUcaRiaaiodaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaaal8aaba Wdbiaad6gacqGH9aqpcaaIXaaapaqaa8qacqGHEisPa0GaeyyeIuoa aaa@4E06@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
